description: Submission of details of all materials to be used on the external faces of the development pursuant to condition 3; Demolition Logistics Plan and a Construction Logistics Plan pursuant to condition 4; Secured by Design pursuant to condition 10; enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w + Ctr of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling /wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings [eg. living room and kitchen above/adjacent to bedrooms of separate dwellings] pursuant to condition 11; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 14; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 15; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 16; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 17; verification report pursuant to condition 18; onward long-term monitoring methodology report pursuant to condition 19; PILING METHOD STATEMENT pursuant to condition 21 of planning permission ref: 2024/00545/FUL granted 18th December 2024.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
